comment: This could be the definition of prisoner of the moment , and I ll definitely admit if I m wrong , but I can t see Green Bay going to San Francisco and winning . I CAN see Seattle .
amr:
# ::snt This could be the definition of prisoner of the moment , and I ll definitely admit if I m wrong , but I can t see Green Bay going to San Francisco and winning . I CAN see Seattle .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (p / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 (d / define-01
                        :ARG0 (t / this)
                        :ARG1 (ii / imprison-01
                              :time (m2 / moment))))
            :op2 (a2 / admit-01
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :manner (d2 / definite)
                  :condition (w / wrong-04
                        :ARG1 ii2)))
      :snt2 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (s / see-01
                        :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
                        :ARG1 (a3 / and
                              :op1 (g / go-01
                                    :ARG1 (b / bay
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Green"
                                                :op2 "Bay"))
                                    :ARG4 (c2 / city
                                          :name (n2 / name
                                                :op1 "San"
                                                :op2 "Francisco")))
                              :op2 (w2 / win-01
                                    :ARG0 b))))
            :ARG2 (p3 / possible-01
                  :ARG1 (s2 / see-01
                        :ARG0 ii3
                        :ARG1 (c3 / city
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Seattle"))))))

comment: As a Niner fan , Seattle scares me ( mobile qb ) . Green Bay does not . Rooting for the pack tomorrow for sure .
amr:
